div.p: Meal Pickup Dates for the Remainder of April: Starting Monday, April 20 and continuing through the end of April, meals will be available for pickup on Mondays and Wednesdays from 11 am- Noon. The...

img.alt: Frequently Asked Questions About the Upcoming Levy (April 28, 2020)

h3.a: Frequently Asked Questions About the Upcoming Levy (April 28, 2020)

div.p: A substitute operating levy for Edgewood City Schools will be on the April 28, 2020 ballot. This will appear as Issue 5 on the ballot. This levy is a continuation of the expiring 2015 levy and...
Here are several important topics for the upcoming week (April 13-17): Meal Pickup Program Meals will be available for pick up on Wednesday, April 15 from 11 am- Noon. (This is the only day that...
This is an update from Edgewood City Schools: Schools are now Closed for today, Friday, February 7, 2020 due to the weather.
Edgewood City Schools will be on a 2 Hour Delay today, February 7, 2020 due to the inclement weather. There will be no A.M. Preschool.

Construction will begin next week (Week of Feb. 3rd) on St. Rt. 73 & Jacksonburg Rd. in preparation for the roundabout. Click here for more details from the Ohio Dept. of Transportation: http://content.govdelivery.com/bulletins/gd/OHDOT-278c8fe

Reminder, the 4-H Township Night Out is this Wednesday, Jan. 29. Come and see what 4-H is all about! Kids from K-12 can participate. An information meeting will be held at the Wayne Township Fire House, Oxford Middletown Rd., 6:30- 8:00 pm. For more details: https://5il.co/catr
